column4: hey all, I'm using Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS,  Apache/2.2.14 (Ubuntu), PHP 5.3.2-1ubuntu4.17 and mysql  Ver 14.14 Distrib 5.1.63.... when i execute a simple php script which queries a mysql table it's taking 2 minutes or more to finish
on another server using a different Ubuntu version 12.04, it's instant
any known issues that could cause this ?
I would check the database for corruption first off.
